data.question: What is the empirical formula of compound 1a?
data.answer: C32 H24 Au2 F3 N2 O7 P2 S

data.question: What temperature were the crystallographic data for 2b collected at?
Is the crystal system of compound 1b triclinic?
What is the method used to prepare compound 2a?
data.answer: Method 1 involves adding solid Na2CO3 to neutralize CF3CO2H, followed by filtration and evaporation. Method 2 involves reacting (Âµ-dppm)Au2Cl2 with AgCF3CO2, then adding 2-thiouracil and NaOH, followed by filtration and evaporation.

data.question: What is the maximum and minimum transmission for the crystallographic data of 2b?
Does the compound 1a exhibit a tetragonal crystal system?
What is the final R index for compound 1b when I>2sigma(I)?
Can the luminescence of compound 2 be turned off by exposure to CF3COOH vapor?
What is the process to reverse the loss of luminescence in compound 2?
data.answer: Exposure of solid 2 to NEt3 vapor reverses the loss of luminescence.

data.question: Is the space group of compound 2b P2(1)/c?
What is the yield of compound 1b when prepared by method 1?
What changes occur in the emission spectrum of 1b upon gentle crushing?
data.answer: The emission spectrum changes to exhibit bright blue or cyan photoluminescence.

data.question: Is the emission intensity of compound 1 in CH2Cl2/toluene solution at 77 K concentration dependent?
What is the role of Na2CO3 in the synthesis of compound 2?
data.answer: Na2CO3 is used to neutralize CF3CO2H, a side-product of the reaction.

data.question: Does the crystal structure of 1a exhibit an aurophilic helix?
What is the effect of pH on the luminescence of compound 1 in fluid solution?
data.answer: The luminescence of compound 1 in fluid solution is sensitive to changes in pH.

data.question: What is the crystal system of compound 2b?
Can the conversion of compound 1 to its emissive form be achieved by sonication?
What is the role of CF3COOH vapor in the luminescence properties of compound 2?
data.answer: Exposure to CF3COOH vapor leads to a slow loss of luminescence in compound 2.

data.question: Is the emission of compound 1b in CH2Cl2 solution blue emissive?
